name: Ghost Town Defense
description:
An evil ghost legion has been invading the human world. With the help of Qian, the kind-hearted ghost princess, Sam takes up arms and gets ready to put up a fight. Of course, it won't be an easy task. Playing as Sam, you will have to find and utilize the lost treasures and hidden items in the game to maximize your defense against the spooky enemies while keeping a keen eye on the unexpected surprise attacks. In the Survival Mode, you must complete the challenge within a limited time. Your skills and strategy are put to the test of the most exciting battles ever seen. And you will have only one shot for the victory. Ghost Tower Defense, Your Challenge Awaits!

Game Features:

- Multiple game modes with 12 unique towers and traps. Each device has its designated use. You'll have much fun by messing around different device compositions and combos!
- As Sam grows stronger, he will acquire new abilities. It is essential to select and use these skills wisely to beat the game.
- Keep a sharp eye on the hidden items and helping hands. They can help you turn the tide.
- There are three Big Bosses with formidable capabilities in the ghost legion. Watch out for them. And of course, if you defeat and conquer them, you'll be handsomely rewarded.
- Complete the main storyline to unlock the Challenge Mode, experiencing even more exciting and enjoyable gameplay!
- The Ultimate Endless Mode! See how long you can hold up there!
